message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this incredible product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the price I'm offering. Here's my initial offer:
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,200. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8,400. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and the market demand.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $7,800. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $8,100. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,900. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market demand.

I'm not willing to go below $8,100, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'll meet you at $8,050. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,050, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,900. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7,900 and $8,050, so I'll offer $7,975. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market demand.

I'm not willing to go below $8,000, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it. I'm not willing to meet you at $7,975, but I'm willing to make one last compromise. I'll meet you at $8,025. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,025, but I've already made a counteroffer to you. I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. I'd like to propose $8,025 as my final offer.
